summary: A young woman with long brown hair, wearing a white coat and scarf, is sitting in an office-like room with posters on the wall and a window in the background. She appears to be a special education teacher trying to figure out what her student is scripting. The scene includes a humorous audio clip of a conversation about a dream involving condiments.
keywords: Special Ed, teacher, student, scripting, dream, ketchup, mustard, mayonnaise
